Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2010 05:14AM lostfloridian wrote: Zeeka, I know exactly what you mean by NOT KNOWING.  I'm NED right now, but I've only had one set of scans.  My next ones are in a month.  When do you become comfortable with your disease, or lack thereof?  I have no idea.  I think the biggest part of this disease so far has been the waiting.

Posts.Content: Dec 20, 2009 07:52PM lostfloridian wrote: Ladies, thanks for the replies.  I, also am going through the sweaty hot flashes.  Right now I'm having one so bad that my ears feel like they're on fire.  Good grief!  I guess I was just wondering if there ever will be the possibility of companionship, and yes, sex!  I'm only 48 and I guess I just never foresaw this conundrum.  Hmm, what to do?
